features.featureTitle: Replace the current primary coin image (pointless-coin-new.dim_512x512.png) with the newly provided coin image (pointless-coin-p.dim_512x512.png) — a gold 3D coin with a white 'P' letter on it and a transparent background — across all components where the coin image appears, including HeroSection, Navigation (logo), AboutSection, CommunitySection CTA banner, and any other component currently rendering the coin image.
